_S.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

OrderChange.description: A document used to specify changes to an existing Order.

OrderChange.title: Order Change. Details
OrderChange.description: A document used to specify changes to an existing Order.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Order Change. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Order Change. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Order Change. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Order Change. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Order Change. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

SalesOrderID.title: Order Change. Sales_ Order Identifier. Identifier
SalesOrderID.description: An identifier for the Order Change, assigned by the seller.

CopyIndicator.title: Order Change. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Order Change. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Order Change. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Order Change. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

SequenceNumberID.title: Order Change. Sequence Number. Identifier
SequenceNumberID.description: The Order Change Sequence Number assigned by the Buyer to ensure the proper sequencing of changes.

Note.title: Order Change. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

RequestedInvoiceCurrencyCode.title: Order Change. Requested Invoice_ Currency Code. Code
RequestedInvoiceCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying he currency requested for amount totals in Invoices related to this Order Change.

DocumentCurrencyCode.title: Order Change. Document_ Currency Code. Code
DocumentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the default currency for this document.

PricingCurrencyCode.title: Order Change. Pricing_ Currency Code. Code
PricingCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency that is used for all prices in the Order Change.

TaxCurrencyCode.title: Order Change. Tax_ Currency Code. Code
TaxCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency requested for tax amounts in Invoices related to this Order Change.

CustomerReference.title: Order Change. Customer_ Reference. Text
CustomerReference.description: A supplementary reference for the transaction (e.g., CRI when using purchasing card).

AccountingCostCode.title: Order Change. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: The buyer's accounting code, applied to the Order Change as a whole.

AccountingCost.title: Order Change. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: The buyer's accounting code, applied to the Order Change as a whole, expressed as text.

LineCountNumeric.title: Order Change. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of Order Change lines in the document.

ValidityPeriod.title: Order Change. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: A period during which the Order Change is valid.

OrderReference.title: Order Change. Order Reference
OrderReference.description: A reference to the Order being changed.

QuotationDocumentReference.title: Order Change. Quotation_ Document Reference. Document Reference

OriginatorDocumentReference.title: Order Change. Originator_ Document Reference. Document Reference
OriginatorDocumentReference.description: A reference to an originator document associated with this document.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Order Change. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Contract.title: Order Change. Contract
Contract.description: A contract associated with the Order being changed.

Signature.title: Order Change. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Order Change. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

SellerSupplierParty.title: Order Change. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

OriginatorCustomerParty.title: Order Change. Originator_ Customer Party. Customer Party

FreightForwarderParty.title: Order Change. Freight Forwarder_ Party. Party

AccountingCustomerParty.title: Order Change. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party

AccountingSupplierParty.title: Order Change. Accounting_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

Delivery.title: Order Change. Delivery
Delivery.description: A delivery associated with this document.

DeliveryTerms.title: Order Change. Delivery Terms
DeliveryTerms.description: A set of delivery terms associated with this document.

PaymentTerms.title: Order Change. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: A set of payment terms associated with this document.

TransactionConditions.title: Order Change. Transaction Conditions
TransactionConditions.description: Purchasing, sales, or payment conditions applying to the whole Order being changed.

AllowanceCharge.title: Order Change. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: A discount or charge that applies to a price component.

TaxExchangeRate.title: Order Change. Tax_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
TaxExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the tax currency.

PricingExchangeRate.title: Order Change. Pricing_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PricingExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the pricing currency.

PaymentExchangeRate.title: Order Change. Payment_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PaymentExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment currency.

DestinationCountry.title: Order Change. Destination_ Country. Country
DestinationCountry.description: The country of destination (for customs purposes).

TaxTotal.title: Order Change. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total amount of a specific type of tax.

AnticipatedMonetaryTotal.title: Order Change. Anticipated_ Monetary Total. Monetary Total
AnticipatedMonetaryTotal.description: The amount of change to the total cost of the order anticipated by the buyer.

OrderLine.title: Order Change. Order Line
OrderLine.description: An association to one or more (changed) Order Lines.
